headline: Bernstein Lowers Campbell’s (CPB) PT to $33, Cites Strong Broths/Premium Brands Despite Soup Struggles
summary: The Campbell’s Company (NASDAQ:CPB) is one of the high short interest stocks to buy right now. On December 10, Bernstein lowered the firm’s price target on Campbell’s Company to $33 from $39 and maintained an Outperform rating on the shares. According to Bernstein, the company’s product mix generally aligns with current consumer trends. Their Meals […]
